activities:
Personal Information received from the EU/EEA and/or Switzerland:
Neato receives customer personal information from the EU/EEA and Switzerland.  Neato collects customer data during transactions and communications with its customers including, without limitations, when users register, use, update or request support for, Neato products and services or participates in surveys.  Customer data is transferred from EU Neato offices to Neato Robotics Inc. (which is located in the United States) for the purposes of marketing, providing services, customer support, customer communications, creating, developing, operating, delivering and improving products, services, content and advertising, and administering sweepstakes, contests, or promotions.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Customer Data when user registers his/her products, call us for product support, etc.  Mostly this is gathered on our website, Neato app, and Customer Care.
recoursemech: Consumers may contact Neato Robotics Inc. with privacy complaints or disputes by emailing privacy@neatorobotics.com.  If the matter cannot be resolved through internal Neato Robotics Inc. procedures, then Neato Robotics Inc. will comply with EU Data Protection Authority (EU DPA)of the individual's respective country or the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC) to investigate unresolved complaints.
